name: SplitAbout
description: Split-layout about section with bullet points on one side and image/video on the other.

description.example: Learn more about our mission, values, and what drives us forward

buttonRules.note: Button variant controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant. All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level.

structure.title: string - Bullet point heading (required)
structure.icon: LucideIcon - Optional icon displayed above title

bulletPointRules.note: Bullet points are separated by horizontal dividers. Border radius controlled by ThemeProvider's borderRadius (options: 'sharp', 'rounded', 'soft', 'pill'). All sections should be wrapped in a single ThemeProvider at the app/page level.

videoSrc.note: Takes precedence over imageSrc if both provided

imageAlt.note: Empty string marks image as decorative (aria-hidden)

propsSchema.title: string
propsSchema.titleSegments?: Array<{ type: 'text', content: string } | { type: 'image', src: string, alt?: string }> - For inline images in title
propsSchema.buttons?: Array<{text: string, onClick?: () => void, href?: string}>
propsSchema.bulletPoints: Array<{ title: string, description: string, icon?: LucideIcon }>
propsSchema.textboxLayout: 'default' | 'split' | 'split-actions' | 'split-description' | 'inline-image' (required - 'inline-image' uses titleSegments for rich text with images)

usageExample:
// Wrap in ThemeProvider
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="text-stagger" defaultTextAnimation="entrance-slide" borderRadius="rounded" background="aurora" cardStyle="glass-elevated" primaryButtonStyle="gradient" secondaryButtonStyle="glass">
  <SplitAbout title="About Us" description="Learn more about our mission, values, and what drives us forward" textboxLayout="default" useInvertedBackground={"noInvert"} bulletPoints={[{ title: 'Innovation', description: 'We push boundaries', icon: Lightbulb }, { title: 'Quality', description: 'Excellence in every detail' }]} imageSrc="/about.jpg" />
</ThemeProvider>
